.mars-component .img-grid {
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.mars-component .img-grid figure {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  vertical-align: top;
  width: 100%;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.three-horizontal figure img {
  width: 100%;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.three-horizontal figure.two {
  width: 95px;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.three-horizontal figure.three {
  width: 142px;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.three-horizontal .d-flex figure {
  margin: 10px 10px 0 0;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.three-vertical figure img {
  width: 100%;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.three-vertical figure.one {
  margin-right: 10px;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.three-vertical figure.two {
  width: 60px;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.three-vertical figure.three {
  width: 90px;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.three-vertical figure.two, .mars-component .img-grid.three-vertical figure.three {
  margin-top: 10px;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.featured-story-grid .featured-story {
  width: auto;
  position: relative;
  margin-left: 25px;
  margin-right: 25px;
  top: -40px;
  margin-bottom: -40px;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.two-horizontal figure {
  width: 50%;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.two-horizontal figure img {
  width: 100%;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.two-horizontal figure.one {
  margin: 0 5px 0 0;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.two-horizontal figure.two {
  margin: 30px 0 0 5px;
}

.mars-component .img-grid.two-horizontal.featured-story-grid .featured-story {
  top: -48px;
  margin-bottom: -48px;
}

.mars-component .column-content {
  max-width: 532px;
}

.mars-component .column-content .inline-quote {
  margin-top: 20px;
  line-height: 24px;
}

.mars-component .column-content a.btn {
  margin-top: 10px;
}

.mars-component .column-content a.font-family-bold {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.mars-component .flex-md-row-reverse .img-grid.three-horizontal .d-flex {
       -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
       -webkit-box-direction: reverse;
       -ms-flex-direction: row-reverse;
       flex-direction: row-reverse;
       max-width: 682px;
}

.mars-component .flex-md-row-reverse .img-grid.three-horizontal .d-flex figure {
  margin: 10px 0 0 10px;
}

.mars-component .zero-top-margin {
  margin-top: 60px;
}

.mars-component .zindex-position--relative {
  z-index: 99;
  position: relative;
}
